738240.name: Fantasy Grounds - Tropicana: Die Fast... (or die trying) (Savage Worlds)
738240.description:
Tropicana: Die Fast... (or die trying)

On the sunny road that goes along the beautiful beach of Bahia del Sol, the heroes find themselves in the middle of a shooting, a hail of lead pouring onto an old Kombi cabover panel van. And from there, things only get worse!
An introductory adventure for Tropicana, for 3-6 Novice Heroes or a Startup Agency. Hails of bullets, chases, fights, deadly mysteries, windows smashing and shards of glass everywhere; find out the secrets of that damn corpse everybody wants to get their hands on!
Conversion by Perry Chalmers
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Perry Chalmers
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
